archimate:BusinessRole.name: Passive Thing
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation: A Man-Made Thing that does not have the capacity to operate its own Agent(s). Examples include documents, books, non-computerized goods, data structures, legal matters, etc. Mutually exclusive with Active Thing. See Appendix B and Appendix C.
